3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Solid 3D generation with clear heights and thickness; consistent isometric perspective.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Excellent room adjacency and wall layout. Door orientations are slightly simplified but mostly correct.

interior_elements.notes: Strong furniture correspondence. Kitchen, bathrooms, and bedrooms are accurately populated relative to the plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean, intelligible render with no text intrusion or significant artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Inner door swing directions are simplified/arched compared to the architectural plan.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains room proportions, furniture placement, and architectural layout of the source plan.
